verses.verse: When <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> brought <S%H7725>back<s%> those who <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> we were like those who <S%H2492>dream.<s%>

Then our <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7814>laughter,<s%> and our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> with <S%H7440>singing.<s%> Then they <S%H559>said<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> great things for <S%H1431>them.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1431>things<s%> for <S%H8056>us,<s%> and we are glad.
Restore our <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> like the <S%H650>streams<s%> in the <S%H5045>Negev.<s%>

He who <S%H3212>goes<s%> <S%H1980>out<s%> <S%H1058>weeping,<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H4901>sowing,<s%> will <S%H935>certainly<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> again with <S%H7440>joy,<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> his <S%H485>sheaves.<s%>
